entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
